alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 10:57AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Warrick and northeastern Spencer Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 956 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dale, or 14 miles northeast of Boonville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dale around 1000 AM CDT. Santa Claus around 1005 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 49 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
